name: Ch.13ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Neimi;...|There you are...|Just stay still a little longer...
speak;Neimi;Oh!|I was tracking the same one.|I've been following it since dawn.
speak;Marisa;I saw it first.|By the river.
speak;Neimi;O-oh...|I'm sorry.|I didn't realize someone else was hunting here.
speak;Marisa;...|It's gone now.|Our talking scared it.
speak;Neimi;I'm so sorry!|I didn't mean to ruin your hunt!|I just...
speak;Marisa;Your bow stance.|It's good.|Where did you learn?
speak;Neimi;My grandfather taught me.|He was the best hunter in our village.|He always said patience was more important than strength.
speak;Marisa;He was right.|Your approach was silent.|I didn't hear you until the last moment.
speak;Neimi;Really?|Thank you!|Grandfather taught me to walk heel-to-toe when stalking.|And to always test each step before putting weight down.
speak;Marisa;Smart.|I was taught differently.|To move with the forest sounds.|Step when birds call.|Freeze when they quiet.
speak;Neimi;That's clever!|I never thought of using bird calls as cover.|Was it your father who taught you that?
speak;Marisa;Yes.|He was a mercenary.|But hunting came first.|Fighting came second.
speak;Neimi;My grandfather was the same way.|He said "A hunter feeds the village.|A soldier protects it.|Both are needed."
speak;Marisa;Your grandfather.|Wise man.|What else did he teach you?

speak;Neimi;Well...|He showed me how to use different arrows for different game.|Blunted tips for birds so you don't damage too much meat.|Barbed heads for larger animals that might run after being hit.
speak;Marisa;Practical.|My father taught tracking.|Reading broken twigs.|Identifying droppings.|Aging footprints.
speak;Neimi;That's amazing!|I'm still learning tracking.|I mostly follow game trails and look for fresh marks.
speak;Marisa;I can show you.|If you want.
speak;Marisa;Why not?|You could teach me bow techniques.|Fair trade.
speak;Neimi;I'd love that!|Oh!|Actually, I think I see our deer again.|Over there, behind that thicket.
speak;Marisa;I see it.|Too far for my sword.|Your range is better.
speak;Neimi;We could work together.|I can drive it toward you with a warning shot.|Then you can make the kill.
speak;Marisa;Good plan.|I'll circle around.|Give me thirty seconds.|Then shoot high.
speak;Neimi;Grandfather always said...|The best hunters know when to work together.|One, two, three...
speak;Neimi;Got it!|It's running right where Marisa should be!
speak;Neimi;We did it!|I've never hunted like that before!|It worked perfectly!
speak;Neimi;I'd like that!|And I can show you how my grandfather preserved meat for winter.|If you're interested...
speak;Marisa;I am.|My father had methods too.|We can compare.
speak;Marisa;Yes.|Now let's dress this deer.|Before dark.
speak;Neimi;Right!|I have my skinning knife right here.
